item.title: Replace Strings With Sed in Directory and Sub Directories
item.description: The first line occurrences of “foo” will be replaced with “bar”. And you can using the second line to check. grep -rl 'foo' . | xargs sed -i 's/foo/bar/g' grep 'foo' -r * | awk -F: {'print $1'} | sort -n | uniq -c
